description: Detects potential suspicious winget package installation from a suspicious source.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential Suspicious Winget Package Installation
query: (Contents:\[ZoneTransfer\]\ \ ZoneId\=3* AND Contents:(*\:\/\/1* OR *\:\/\/2* OR *\:\/\/3* OR *\:\/\/4* OR *\:\/\/5* OR *\:\/\/6* OR *\:\/\/7* OR *\:\/\/8* OR *\:\/\/9*) AND file.path.text:"*\:Zone.Identifier" AND file.path.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\WinGet\\*")
